title: Champion Update: Viktor, the Machine Herald

replies.body: Awwwww man. Now people are going to actually play viktor, and I won't feel like a special snowflake anymore.
Maybe you should pick up urgot, the original hipster.
Hey man, I use Urgot.  He's a good adc champion. {{champion:6}}
Yep Urgot the (1/2) man and 4 legs to kick backside{{champion:6}} {{item:3071}}
{{champion:6}}  the walking ballsack
Supporgot is where it's at.
jg {{champion:6}}
ikr i play viktor and no one knows how to lane against him now they are gonna know but i like the fact that they are making him slightly better
Anivia unnerffed since 1998.
Articuno was pretty op in pokemon also.
actually, articuno is 4x weak too stealth rock and is barely used in pokemon.
Articuno my ass. My 6 magicarp team shits on all
@RealDarkprince, in competitive Pokemon, Stealth Rock is one of the biggest threats in the game. Against Articuno, Stealth Rocks take out 1/2 of it's HP, due to 4x weakness.

lol i know right lol
itll be nice to have the extra slot in our inventory though
They're not removing the hextech core as an item.  They're just changing how it upgrades.  you can basically get all 3 upgrades if you spend enough gold so Viktor's lategame should be stronger now
Riot please make it so that when he gets the perfect augment he yells out "THE GLORIOUS EVOLUTION"
"The Glorious Evolution has been completed!"
It will never be complete till everyone is cyborg, read the lore
WELCOME TO THE LEAGUE OF GLORIOUS EVOLUTION
{{champion:119}} wat
"BEHOLD the true power of the GLORIOUS EVOLUTION!"
This comment will get buried. I am eating a chicken sandwich.
proof or it didnt happen.I'm eating a chicken pot pie.{{item:2010}}
Looks like a radioactive cinnamon roll to me.
{{champion:14}} Rito plz
Have you looked at the front page recently...?
{{champion:64}} Nope

I'd bet that there is a hidden interaction between {{champion:112}}  and {{champion:126}}  similar to {{champion:121}}  and {{champion:107}} 
A Kha'zix can get a fourth evolution if he kills Rengar under the proper circumstances.
Could Viktor get a fourth augmentation?
Will this also include a hidden, conditional buff for Jayce?
I hope so
viktor gets all 4 augmentations when he gets the final core
Darth Viktor lol

Please tell me there is some form of interaction between him and Kha'Zix{{champion:121}}....

They are both evolving, however one believes metal is perfection, the other is just a zergling.

Also it is very rare to see a fully evolved Kha'Zix but Viktor gets the last one free, so....

technology > nature?
Well, you have to keep in mind that viktor has to pay gold for all of his upgrades except for the final one. Khazix automatically get his at 6/11/16.
{{champion:121}} Doesn't get evolution points at 6,11, 16... That's only if he upgrades his ulti.
But if you don't level up your ult at 6, 11, and 16, you're doing it wrong.
I dont think they cost money anymore
They do, 3000 for full upgrade.
Still waiting...{{champion:44}}
You and me {{champion:83}}
Sion is already confirmed....
{{champion:112}} *Looks over* HA don't worry just stand there for a while buddy, trust me........ *Walks away laughing* >:3
At least he's still Viktor. They didnt pull a Karma on him and make him a completely new champion with a completely new personality.
And Trundle.How the heck did they go from a rotting filthy troll who had a unique personality to an frost-based character.Glad they didn't do it.
if you ruin him i sware to fucking god
trust me he is op as fuk with this rework
That's what everyone said about Cass's rework.
I play a ton of Vitkor.{{champion:112}} He was OP before, everyone else just played him wrong so they thought he was bad.
{{champion:61}} Command: Shockwave was my idea first.
{{champion:112}} you have already experienced the glorious evolution, I see
